EmailTemplate.name: 2.3 Send Status change email
EmailTemplate.subject: Job Placement status changed
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
continued Please do not respond to this email. This email was sent from an unattended mailbox, and replies are not reviewed. Please instead contact your Staffing representative on {!Job_placement__c.Staffing_Associate_email__c}
Dear {!Job_placement__c.Contact_Name__c},
We are writing to advise you that you have been withdrawn from {!Job_placement__c.Wave__c}.
If you have been assigned a new Job Placement you will be advised shortly by a separate communication and you will also receive a new contract for that role.
If you have any questions you can contact me at the email or phone number below.
Thank you for your continued interest in The Challenge.
Kind regards
{!Job_placement__c.Staffing_Associate__c} The Challenge Network e: {!Job_placement__c.Staffing_Associate_email__c}
Ref 2.3
